meanings.info: ～せる connects to -nai stem of 五段 verbs and to サ変 as さ～せる; ～させる connects to -nai stem of 一段 and カ変 verbs and to サ変 as せ～させる
glossary: auxiliary verb indicating the causative voice
auxiliary verb indicating the granting of permission to do something

meanings.info: as 〜(さ)せられる, あら〜せられる, 〜(さ)せ給う, etc.
glossary: auxiliary verb used as an honorific for others' actions
